description: This file defines a React functional component 'Header' that renders the top navigation bar for an LMS platform. It includes brand link, navigation links, cart indicator, user profile info, and sign-in/sign-out controls. It leverages React Router and custom stores for auth and cart state.

methods.name: Header()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the header navigation bar, handling user authentication state, cart item count, and navigation links.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Asynchronous handler function to sign out the user and redirect to home page.
